mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mm_m_sub (id, sub_set_hash, subscriber_id, `group`, `name`, `tree`, operator_id, begin_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{subSet}, #{subscriberId}, #{group}, #{name}, #{tree}, #{operatorId}, #{beginTime})
mapper.select: SELECT mpub.ext_id FROM mm_m_sub msub, mm_m_pub mpub, mm_m_ext mext WHERE msub.sub_set_hash = mpub.pub_set_hash AND mpub.ext_id = mext.id AND mext.name = 'root' AND msub.subscriber_id = #{subscriberId} AND msub.group = #{group} AND msub.name = #{name} AND msub.tree = #{tree} AND msub.end_time IS NULL GROUP BY msub.sub_set_hash
SELECT msub.id FROM mm_m_sub msub WHERE msub.subscriber_id = #{subscriberId} AND msub.group = #{group} AND msub.name = #{name} AND msub.tree = #{tree} AND msub.end_time IS NULL
SELECT count(msub.id) FROM mm_m_sub msub WHERE msub.sub_set_hash = #{subSet} AND end_time IS NULL
